* Ensure high performance in our online payment solutions in terms of availability, security, conversion, operational efficiency and user experience.
* Identify and drive new business opportunities and digital innovations within online payments.
* Own the budget, forecasting, and resource allocation for the area.
* Establish effective processes, KPIs, and performance tracking to ensure efficiency and goal alignment.
* Be an active member of the product leadership team, contributing to the broader development of the organization.



  





**We think it`s good if you have:** 



* Proven leadership experience in a digital product or tech environment, preferably within payments, fintech, or e-commerce.
* Experience managing larger teams and building strong team cultures.
* Deep understanding of online payments and related business models.
* Comfortable working both strategically and hands-on, with strong prioritization and data-driven decision-making skills.



  





**As a person, you are:** 



* Natural leader with excellent communication skills and a coaching leadership style.
* Proactive, pragmatic, and business-oriented mindset.
* Thrives on creating structure, driving improvements, and fostering growth in collaboration with others.



  





**What can we offer you?** 




 Together with driven and inspiring colleagues, you will be part of an exciting company undergoing a transformational journey, shaping the future of payment solutions.
 



  





 We offer a dynamic and supportive work environment with centrally located offices in Stockholm. All our employees enjoy an attractive benefits package and opportunities for professional growth and development the company.
 



  





**Want to be our Head of Online? Send us your application today! The position is full time and begins as soon as possible or according to agreement.** 




  





**Location:** 
 Stockholm
 



  





 The last day to apply is 2025-09-30. Applications are confidential. Candidate selection and interviews are on-going and the position may be filled prior to the last day to apply.
 



  





**For questions about this position, please contact** 
 Johan Breidemalm
 



 johan.breidemalm@swedbankpay.se
 



  





 Finansförbundet: Heidi Larsson +46 73 04 42 168
 



 SACO: Sofia Enekvist +46 70 27 88 106
 



  





**Swedbank Pay does not discriminate anybody** 
 based on gender, age, sexual orientation or sexual identity, ethnicity, religion or disability – everybody is welcome. We value the qualities that a diverse group of people brings to our business. In order to be as open-minded as possible in our recruitment, we use anonymization of the CV. We also ask you to exclude: name, age, gender and photos in your personal letter.
 



  





 As part of our recruitment process, we validate identity and conduct background checks to ensure a secure hiring experience.
 



  





*Please note that we have already chosen our recruitment channels and therefore do not wish to be approached by external recruitment firms or ad sellers.* 




  





***Swedbank Pay***




***PayEx***
*is the Nordic region’s foremost name for complete payment solutions. It operates as two main brands: PayEx Ledger & Factoring and Swedbank Pay.* 




  





***Swedbank Pay***
*specialises in payment solutions for resellers and e-commerce, and is dedicated to creating a world where payments between buyers and sellers are as safe and as simple as possible – whether it’s online or in person. We are driven by innovation and our ambition to help people, businesses, and society grow. Today, we are one of the leading companies within payment solutions that operates in Sweden, Norway, Denmark, and Finland. Something that wouldn’t have been possible without our passionate and skilled co-workers! Our organisation and everything we do is built on our core values: Open, Simple, and Caring.*

title: Game Producer
description:
The Quickspin Producer leads our game development projects, from the vision to the execution of roadmaps. You lead a cross functional team daily, while staying within the boundaries of budget, time, and resource plans.
   

  

 You take the game from internal concept ideas to going live with our vast selection of operator customers. You are the link between product, development, and sales to assure the game’s success at all stages.
   

  

 This role suits you who likes to combine structure and creativity. You will be an integral part of the Product team within Quickspin, doing both project & product management, and will play an important part in the creation of world’s most awesome video slots.
   

  

**Qualifications**
**Main Responsibilities:**
* Pitching ideas to stakeholders with clarity and enthusiasm.
* Leading and inspiring the game team through the development process.
* Overseeing game design to ensure creative and technical alignment.
* Managing projects efficiently, ensuring timelines are met.
* Collaborating closely with marketing and commercial teams to ensure game success.
* Representing Quickspin at industry events and conferences.


**Additional Information**
**Required Skills and Qualifications:**
* Excellent understanding in what makes game fun and exciting.
* 2+ years of experience in a similar role within the iGaming industry, specifically focused on the production of slot games.
* Strong experience in Jira, Photoshop, PowerPoint, and game design tools.
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English.
* Proven experience in pitching ideas to stakeholders effectively.
* Strong team leadership skills.


**Additional Preferred Experience**
* Experience in game production and a deep understanding of the gaming industry.
* Strong analytical skills for game design and player engagement.
* Familiarity with Figma is a plus.
* Programming knowledge in any language.


**Who You Are And What We Offer**
 You are a team player with strong initiative and self-motivation thriving in a team environment where the route from idea to implementation is very short. In return we offer an excellent benefit package and a challenging and rewarding job in one of the fastest growing and most exciting industries there is.
   

  

 You will work in a creative, and fun atmosphere at an award-winning company. We are also proud to say that you’ll have the opportunity to have your work seen and enjoyed by millions of users, world-wide.
   

  

**Interested?**

title: Senior Manager - Design Systems
description:
Spotify’s centralized Design System is essential for every user experience we create. Spanning our Consumer products, Business-to-Business (B2B) offerings, and Internal Tools, our system enables cohesive, accessible, and scalable design components across all touchpoints. As we enter a new era powered by AI, we’re looking for a visionary Senior Manager to lead our team and drive our design system to the next level.
   

  

 As Senior Manager you will own the vision, strategy, and execution of Spotify’s centralized design system. You’ll lead a talented multidisciplinary team, bridging design, engineering, and AI to ensure our system empowers all product and design teams with best-in-class tools, patterns, and practices. You’ll play a key role in evolving our design system to unlock the full potential of AI, driving innovation, efficiency, and design coherence at scale. Your background could be in Design, Product or Engineering.
   

  

 What You'll Do
   

  

* Lead the Centralized Design System: Set the strategic direction, roadmap, and priorities for Spotify’s design system, ensuring it meets the needs of consumer products, B2B platforms, and internal tools.
* Drive AI Innovation: Champion the integration of AI-driven capabilities—such as generative design, automation, and intelligent components—to advance how teams use and contribute to the system.
* Team Management: Grow, mentor, and inspire a diverse team of designers, engineers, and design ops specialists, fostering a culture of collaboration and excellence.
* Cross-Company Collaboration: Build strong relationships with product, engineering, and business partners to ensure system adoption, alignment, and impact across all verticals.
* Governance and Quality: Oversee robust governance, documentation, and contribution models to maintain quality, accessibility, and scalability.
* Measure and Improve: Define targets and success metrics, gather feedback across R&D, and continually iterate to improve the system’s effectiveness and reach.
* Evangelize and Educate: Advocate for the value and impact of the design system, hosting internal workshops, presentations, and documentation to drive awareness and engagement.


 Who You Are
   

  

* You have significant experience managing and scaling design systems, ideally in a centralized capacity for large-scale consumer and/or enterprise products.
* You have deep expertise in design principles, UX/UI standards, accessibility, and design operations.
* You have demonstrated experience integrating AI, automation, or machine learning into design systems or workflows.
* You possess strong leadership skills with experience building and mentoring high-performing, cross-functional teams.
* You have a proven ability to influence and collaborate with a wide range of stakeholders, from designers and engineers to product and business leads.
* You are proficient with modern design, prototyping, and documentation tools, and a familiarity with front-end frameworks.
* You are passionate about fostering an inclusive and innovative design culture.
* You have a solid understanding of Design Excellence


 Where You'll Be
   

  

* This role is based in London (UK) or Stockholm (Sweden).
* We offer you the flexibility to work where you work best! There will be some in person meetings, but still allows for flexibility to work from home.


 Spotify is an equal opportunity employer. You are welcome at Spotify for who you are, no matter where you come from, what you look like, or what’s playing in your headphones. Our platform is for everyone, and so is our workplace. The more voices we have represented and amplified in our business, the more we will all thrive, contribute, and be forward-thinking! So bring us your personal experience, your perspectives, and your background. It’s in our differences that we will find the power to keep revolutionizing the way the world listens.
   

  

 At Spotify, we are passionate about inclusivity and making sure our entire recruitment process is accessible to everyone. We have ways to request reasonable accommodations during the interview process and help assist in what you need. If you need accommodations at any stage of the application or interview process, please let us know - we’re here to support you in any way we can.
   

  

 Spotify transformed music listening forever when we launched in 2008. Our mission is to unlock the potential of human creativity by giving a million creative artists the opportunity to live off their art and billions of fans the chance to enjoy and be passionate about these creators. Everything we do is driven by our love for music and podcasting. Today, we are the world’s most popular audio streaming subscription service.

title: Motion Designer (with 3D)
description:
Established in 2004,
 **OLIVER** 
 is the world’s first and only specialist in designing, building, and running bespoke in-house agencies and marketing ecosystems for brands. We partner with over 300 clients in 40+ countries and counting. Our unique model drives creativity and efficiency, allowing us to deliver tailored solutions that resonate deeply with audiences.
   

  

 As a part of
 **The Brandtech Group** 
 , we're at the forefront of leveraging cutting-edge AI technology to revolutionise how we create and deliver work. Our
 **AI solutions** 
 enhance efficiency, spark creativity, and drive insightful decision-making, empowering our teams to produce innovative and impactful results.
   

  

**Motion Designer (6-month FTC with view to extend)**
 Location: Stockholm, Sweden (hybrid)
   

  

**Portfolio Is Required**
**About the role:**
 Are you passionate about motion design, and showcasing your creative and technical talents? We invite you to join our team as a skilled Motion Designer, where your expertise in creating animations, textures, high-quality 3D models, will bring innovative projects to life. Collaborating with a dynamic and diverse group of professionals, you will help redefine what's possible in motion design and 3D artistry while ensuring our projects meet the highest standards of quality and creativity.
   

  

 As a Motion Graphics Designer, you will support the team in executing high-quality design projects, motion graphics, and visual effects for various brands. This role combines hands-on design work with digital and visual design tasks, focusing on both 2D and occasionally 3D animation projects. Your ability to work in a fast-paced environment, coupled with your commitment to innovation and attention to detail, will drive the success of our projects.
   

  

 Reporting directly to the Creative Director the Motion Designer works alongside a multi-disciplinary dynamic team of creative professionals.
   

  

**What you will be doing:** 
  

  

* Motion Graphics & Visual Effects:
+ Support the design and production of motion graphics, animations, and visual effects for advertisements, product videos, and promotional content
+ Assist in editing and refining animations for fluidity and consistency across various media
+ Create digital assets for social media platforms
+ If/When needed, support with graphic design/final art to ensure project deliveries

* Digital & Visual Design:
+ Contribute to concept development, visual design, and graphic design for various projects
+ Assist in developing post imagery and copy, ensuring relevance for multiple markets
+ Support the creation of layout and design for guidelines, toolkits, and strategic documents
+ Participate in film editing, post-production, and creation of digital video assets

* 3D Design & Animation
+ Assist in creating detailed 3D models, textures, lighting, and rendering for products, environments, and characters.
+ Contribute to the development of high-quality, photorealistic renders and animations.
+ Help optimize 3D assets for performance across different platforms and devices.

* Collaboration and Communication:
+ Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand project goals, target audience, and creative direction.
+ Communicate effectively with stakeholders to present ideas, progress updates, and final deliverables.
+ Participate in brainstorming sessions and contribute innovative ideas to enhance the overall design process.

* Technical Expertise:
+ Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and advancements in 3D/2D design and related technologies.
+ Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues related to 3D design & motion graphics software and workflows.
+ Mentor and train junior team members, sharing knowledge and best practices.

* Create detailed motion graphics, animations, and visual effects for various projects, including advertisements, product videos, and promotional content.
* Edit and refine animations to ensure flow.
* Develop high-quality, photorealistic renders and animations that meet project specifications and deadlines.
* Ensure all 3D assets are optimized for performance and compatibility across different platforms and devices.
* Create detailed 3D models, textures, lighting, and rendering for various projects, including products, environments, and characters.


**What you need to be great in this role:**
* 5-7 years of relevant experience
* Show an innate creative flair with exemplary art direction and concepting skills, bursting with ideas that span across multiple platforms. Exhibit a love for exceptional design, motion graphics, and storytelling.
* Possess outstanding modelling, lighting, compositing, and animation skills. Be proficient in the Adobe Creative Suite, including Photoshop, Illustrator, and InDesign, and utilize tools like Substance Designer to craft both organic and inorganic textures and materials.
* Maintain exceptional attention to detail, ensuring no typos or pixelation, and demonstrate a strong grasp of typography, layout, and technical skills that accentuate your craftsmanship.
* Be curious, creative, and ambitious, using your understanding of responsive design, UX, and current social and digital technology trends to push the boundaries in every project.
* Effectively present and communicate ideas with both clients and team members, confidently leading discussions and fostering a collaborative, low-ego environment that values feedback and iteration.
* Show a keen interest in emerging technologies like AI, and possess advanced motion and video skills using After Effects and Premiere to design innovative solutions.
* Execute projects from concept to completion, exhibiting stellar communication, organisational, and time management skills while enjoying a hands-on approach with team collaboration.
* Apply comprehensive branding knowledge, ensuring consistency and quality across all forms of media.
* Experience in consumer goods, luxury, or drinks & beverages sectors preferred.
* Fluency in Swedish and English.


 Req ID: 14373
   

  

 Our values shape everything we do:
   

  

 Be
 **Ambitious** 
 to succeed
   

  

 Be
 **Imaginative** 
 to push the boundaries of what’s possible
   

  

 Be
 **Inspirational** 
 to do groundbreaking work
   

  

 Be
 **always learning and listening** 
 to understand
   

  

 Be
 **Results-focused** 
 to exceed expectations
   

  

 Be
 **actively pro-inclusive and anti-racist** 
 across our community, clients and creations
   

  

*OLIVER,* 
*a part of the Brandtech Group, is an equal opportunity employer committed to creating an inclusive working environment where all employees are encouraged to reach their full potential, and individual differences are valued and respected. All applicants shall be considered for employment without regard to race, ethnicity, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, neurodivergence, disability status, or any other characteristic protected by local laws.*
*OLIVER has set ambitious environmental goals around sustainability, with science-based emissions reduction targets. Collectively, we work towards our mission, embedding sustainability into every department and through every stage of the project lifecycle.*

title: IoT Product Owner
description:
Every day, we get opportunities to make a positive impact – on our colleagues, partners, customers and society. Together, we’re pioneering the solutions of the future and unlocking the full potential of precious resources. Trusted to act on initiative, we challenge conventional thinking to develop world-leading technologies that inspire progress in vital areas, including energy, food, water and shipping.
   

  

 As we push forward, the innovative, open spirit that fuels our 140-year-old start-up culture and rapid growth also drives our personal growth. So, as we shape a more resourceful, less wasteful world, we build our careers too.
   

  

**About The Job**
 At Alfa Laval, we believe in building sustainable solutions that make a real difference to our planet’s most urgent problems. This includes connected services based on Internet-of-Things(IoT) Technology. We have proven use cases of saving energy, water, money and improving efficiency while also documenting compliance to environmental protection legislation. 3 out of 4 vessels in the world carry Alfa Laval equipment – so this is an opportunity to deliver real impact. As part of our empowered and diverse team, you will use your expertise to create high-quality solutions, systems, and technologies that contribute to a better world, every day.
   

  

 As an
 **IoT Product Owner** 
 , you will take ownership of delivering innovative connected services, guiding projects from concept to implementation, and ensuring they meet both business goals and user needs.
   

  

**In This Role, You Will**
* Lead a team of talented developers, testers, and designers to deliver a world-class web portal for accessing and managing IoT data.
* Shape and maintain a clear product vision and roadmap for ALIoT in alignment with business strategy.
* Structure and organize the portal to ensure seamless access and efficient management of connected machine data.
* Collaborate with customers, stakeholders, and team members to gather insights and refine solutions.
* Continuously evaluate and optimize performance and user experience using data-driven decisions.
* Maintain and prioritize the portal backlog.
* Deliver advanced support, maintenance, and administration of systems and technology within your expertise.
* Drive business analysis, requirements management, design, development, configuration, testing, and deployment of solutions.
* Manage project activities, deliveries, and smaller-scale projects as needed.Interact with Business Unit stakeholders in our Marine Business Units


 Note there is no line management responsibilities in the position
   

  

**What You Know**
 We are looking for someone with a solid background in connected services and solution delivery, combined with curiosity to explore new technologies and the drive to make a difference. You bring:
   

  

* Proven experience in product ownership or solution delivery within connected services for the Maritime industry.
* Experience describing and documenting functional requirements for software.
* Strong technical understanding of IoT platforms and platform thinking.
* A background in business analysis and stakeholder engagement.
* Experience in working with Azure DevOps or similar tools for backlog management
* Knowledge of agile methodologies such as scrum or SAFe
* Demonstrated ability to manage projects effectively.
* A Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Engineering, Software Development, or a related field.
* Fluency in English (must-have).
* Danish, Swedish, or Dutch language skills (nice-to-have).


**Who You Are**
 You are here to make an impact—not just on products and solutions, but on people and the planet. You thrive in a collaborative, diverse environment and bring both technical expertise and empathy to the table. You are:
   

  

* An empathetic communicator who builds trust with colleagues and stakeholders.
* Detail-oriented and quality-focused.
* Customer-centric, with a strong service mindset.
* A strategic thinker who balances the big picture with execution.
* Technically curious and eager to learn.
* Resilient and adaptable in changing environments.
* An inclusive leader who values and amplifies diverse perspectives.
* Looking to grow as a professional with a growing organization


**For more information, please contact**
 Anabela Leite, Talent Acquisition Partner, anabela.leite@alfalaval.com
   

  

 Please submit your application no later than
 **September 28th, 2025** 
 . We review applications on a rolling basis, so we encourage you to apply as early as possible. We may close the job advertisement earlier if we find the right candidate. Applications sent directly via email will not be considered due to GDPR regulations.
   

  

**Our commitment to integrity**
 We care about diversity, inclusion, and equity in our recruitment processes. We also believe behavioral traits can provide important insights into a candidate's fit to a role. To help us achieve this, we apply Pymetrics assessments. Upon application, you will be invited to play the assessment games and completing them is mandatory.
   

  

**As part of our commitment to maintaining a safe and secure workplace, we conduct background checks on final candidates for this role.**

title: Experienced UI Artist - Hearts of Iron
description:
**Role Overview**
 As an Experienced UI Artist on
 *Hearts of Iron IV* 
 , you’ll craft the visual language that guides players through one of the most complex and immersive grand strategy games on the market. You’ll work closely with the content designers, UX designers, art director, and programmers to design, implement, and polish user interface elements that are both functional and evocative of the game’s WWII setting.
   

  

**Key Re** 
**sponsibilities**
* Visual Design & Implementation
+ Create high-quality UI elements, icons, event illustrations, and other 2D assets.
+ Develop and maintain the game’s visual identity for menus, HUDs, and in-game overlays.
+ Implement and optimize UI assets in the game engine for performance and clarity.

* Collaboration & Iteration
+ Work closely with content designers to bring the features and country packs to life.
+ Partner with UX designers to ensure usability and player-friendly navigation.
+ Work with programmers to integrate UI features while maintaining design intent.
+ Work with outsourcing partners to help deliver consistent quality on time.
+ Solicit peer reviews and feedback.

* Creative Problem-Solving
+ Adapt designs to support new gameplay features and country expansions.
+ Maintain consistency across the base game and multiple DLC’s.


**Requirements**
* Strong portfolio demonstrating hand-painted digital art skills and a keen eye for typography, composition, and color.
* Working experience designing UI from concept to final implementation.
* Understanding of UX principles and ability to collaborate with UX specialists.
* Moderate scripting skills for UI integration.
* Comfortable using English in spoken and written form.


**Bonus Skills**
* Familiarity with After Effects and 3D software.
* Passion for Paradox’s grand strategy titles or modding and interest in historical themes.
* Skills in CSS, Actionscript, Javascript and HTML.


 In
 *Hearts of Iron IV* 
 , the UI isn’t just a layer on top of gameplay — it’s the command center for global strategy. Your work will directly shape how players plan invasions, manage resources, and rewrite history.
   

  

 Your art will be seen for hundreds of hours by devoted fans across the globe, becoming part of the living history they create.
   

  

 As part of the recruitment process, you may be asked to perform a test.
   

  

 Today, Paradox consists of both publishing and internal game development. We have a broad portfolio of games and own the most important brands, including Stellaris, Europa Universalis, Hearts of Iron, Crusader Kings, Cities: Skylines, Prison Architect, Victoria, Age of Wonders and the World of Darkness catalog of brands.
   

  

 Since 2004, the company has published its games all over the world, initially through physical distribution but primarily in digital channels after 2006. Paradox games are developed primarily for PC and console platforms, but the company also releases games on mobile. The largest markets today include the US, UK, China, Germany, France and Scandinavia. In total, Paradox games have over five million players each month.

title: Interim Product Design Lead (16 months)
company_industry: Fashion Accessories Manufacturing and Retail Apparel and Fashion
description:
💙 Sellpy’s vision is to empower everyone to live circularly. We see a tremendous financial, social and environmental value in making sure unused items are put to use again. We are looking for colleagues who share this vision, and are eager to see their work contribute to a sustainable future.
 



  





***Interim Product Design Lead* 
 at Sellpy** 




  





**In short, you will** 



* Lead and inspire a team of four skilled UX and UI designers
* Get hands-on by contributing directly to daily design work
* Own and evolve Sellpy’s design system to ensure consistency and an effective way of working
* Mentor and support designers, helping them grow through coaching and guidance
* Improve design processes to increase productivity
* Plan and prioritize design work effectively
* Ensure excellent collaboration and communication between the product design team and the rest of Sellpy—fostering transparency, shared understanding, and effective teamwork across functions
* Collaborate cross-functionally with product managers, engineers, and other stakeholders to deliver seamless, enjoyable and impactful user experiences
* Influence product direction by aligning user and business needs and contributing to strategic planning, roadmaps, and prioritization
* Grow awareness and understanding of design’s impact across the organization
* Recruit future design talent by participating in hiring processes and onboarding new team members



  





**Requirements** 




  





**Education & Experience** 



* 4-5 years of UX design experience in building software products especially customer facing, B2C products like ecommerce
* Excellent problem-solving skills and a love for UX challenges
* Have experience in working with cross-functional teams in iterative product development cycles
* A passion for great leadership and seeing team members grow!
* B.S or M.S. degree in Engineering, Design or a related field
* Written and spoken fluency in English



  





**Skills** 



* Expertise in user-centered design and design thinking methodologies, from problem discovery to solution delivery
* Experience with conducting user research, facilitating ideation, creating prototypes and designs, running user tests, and extracting actionable insights to inform product decisions
* Experience working with Figma (our primary design tool at Sellpy)
* Experience working with design systems
* Understanding of accessibility standards (WCAG 2.2)
* Able to assess the trade-offs between design impact and implementation effort to deliver high-value outcomes efficiently



  





 You bring strong empathy, communication, and collaboration skills, enabling you to lead and work effectively with cross-functional teams. You plan and prioritize design work with a strategic view, guide and inspire others, and foster a positive team culture. As a clear communicator, you advocate for design decisions, bridge the needs of design, development, business, and users. You are a team player with strong leadership skills and have the ability to work without ego. At Sellpy we are all friends and we care for each other.
 



  





**We’d be impressed if you have** 



* Worked in a fast-growing, product-focused startup environment
* Background in re-commerce, e-commerce, or a related digital product domain
* Experience in hiring, scaling and leading a team of designer



  





**You get to** 



* Be part of a tech-minded company that's driving the change towards a sustainable lifestyle. In return, you will get direction, energy, and work on meaningful challenges daily
* Benefit from hybrid work from our offices at Medborgarplatsen, Rosersberg, and from home
* Work with highly skilled and motivated colleagues
* Gain new skills with unlimited access to a learning platform
* Make use of prepaid vacation
* Enjoy Sellpy credits and staff discounts at Sellpy and the H&M brands (Arket, COS, Other Stories, Weekday and more)
* Save up with a monthly pension plan
* Engagement in Sellpy’s social traditions with game nights, interactive planning days, guest speakers and other activities



  





**Location** 




 You are welcome to do all these things at our new office at Medborgarplatsen in Stockholm, and from home.
 



**Form of employment:** 
 Full-time, temporary
 



**Start:** 
 1st October or 1st November
 



**End:** 
 1st March 2027
 



  





 Ready to make an impact? Send in your application today — we’re excited to hear from you! 💙

title: Product Design Lead – AI Assistant & Conversational UX(Bangkok – Based, Relocation Provided)
description:
**About Agoda**
 Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with a global network of 4.7M hotels and holiday properties worldwide, plus flights, activities, and more. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 7,100+ employees representing 95+ nationalities in 27 markets foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.
   

  

 Our Purpose - Bridging the World Through Travel
   

  

 We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.
   

  

 This role is BANGKOK-BASED, RELOCATION PROVIDED.
   

  

 Get to Know Our Design Team:
   

  

 The Design team is a diverse group of product designers and researchers that help to build Agoda’s products from our home office in Bangkok. Being a product-driven company, we constantly partner with product managers and engineers to understand user problems and design workflows, interactions, and visual interfaces.
   

  

 This is a great time to join a team that’s small enough to be scrappy and hands on, yet big enough to influence change and product strategy.
   

  

 There’s always room to grow here. As a Product Design Lead, you can deepen your craft through complex problem-solving and systems thinking, or expand your leadership by mentoring others, driving strategy, and leading cross-functional initiatives. This is a great time to join a team that’s small enough to be scrappy and hands on, yet big enough to influence change and product strategy.
   

  

 We’re building the next generation of AI-powered travel experiences, and conversational UX is central to that vision. Join our design team to help shape how users engage with intelligent travel assistants, real-time chat, and natural language interfaces across platforms.
   

  

 The Role
   

  

 We’re looking for a Product Design Lead to join our AI Assistant team and shape the future of conversational travel experiences. This hybrid role blends hands-on product design with light team leadership, managing a small group of 2–3 talented designers.
   

  

 You’ll lead the UX strategy for AI-powered interactions like smart chat, trip planning, support automation, and contextual travel recommendations. You’ll also mentor designers, collaborate closely with product and engineering, and help evolve our design culture across the organisation.
   

  

 What You’ll Do
   

  

 Design & Execution
   

  

* Lead the end-to-end design of AI and chat-based experiences across web and app
* Translate complex AI capabilities into clear, helpful user flows and intuitive interfaces
* Create prototypes and flows that balance clarity, trust, and speed for our users
* Drive UX and visual design quality within your scope, while aligning with Agoda’s broader vision
* Partner with Design Leadership, Product managers, Engineers, Researchers, Analysts and Content designers to shape what we build and how we build it
* Use data-driven insights, research, and industry best practices to align on design direction.


 Leadership & People
   

  

* Manage and mentor a small team of 2–3 designers, focusing on growth and creativity
* Provide regular feedback, run critiques, and support career development
* Help scale design culture, systems, and quality through org-wide design initiatives
* Act as a thought partner to senior stakeholders across Product, Data Science, and Engineering


 What You’ll Bring
   

  

* 7+ years of experience in product or interaction design, with proven hands-on craft
* Experience designing for conversational interfaces, chatbots, or AI-powered systems
* A strong portfolio showing user-centered thinking and high-quality execution
* Ability to simplify complexity through clear information architecture and interaction flows
* Experience leading design discussions and collaborating cross-functionally
* Mentorship or light people management experience is a plus
* Familiarity with LLMs, natural language UX, or multimodal interactions is a bonus
* A data-informed mindset with experience using research, analytics, and best practices to guide design decisions and validate ideas with cross-functional teams


 Bonus Points
   

  

* Background in voice UX, multimodal interfaces, or customer support tools
* Experience with localisation and designing for multilingual audiences
* Familiarity with personalisation engines or recommendation systems
* Prior experience in travel, e-commerce, or large-scale B2C platforms


 Why This Role
   

  

 This is a rare chance to combine craft leadership and small-team management in a high-impact AI product area. You’ll influence the direction of a new travel paradigm and shape the conversational layer that connects users to Agoda’s entire ecosystem, from search to support to inspiration.
   

  

 Join us to help build the next generation of AI-powered travel experiences.

title: Senior Product Manager
description:
Voyado is a fast-growing company containing two products, with the mission to deliver a best-of-breed solution that matches every customer's needs. Engage, a data-driven SaaS platform within Marketing Automation, CRM, and Loyalty. Elevate is intelligent software that maps, analyzes, and learns from the visitor's behavior in real time, which allows the e-tailer to present relevant products and offers, adapted to each individual.
   

  

**About The Role**
 This is a high-impact role where you will join our team, Bonnie, in a new strategic AI initiative. You will be responsible for the direction of our insight and activation capabilities, helping our retail customers gain predictive, explainable, and actionable insights to drive personalization and commercial success.
   

  

 Bonnie is an AI-driven, always-on, in-app assistant designed to guide, automate, and take action across our CRM platform. As part of your role, you will continuously identify and drive opportunities for improvement across the product lifecycle, showing product excellence by coaching others, creating shared standards, and modelling a customer-centric and outcome-driven mindset.
   

  

*Some examples of your responsibilities:*
* Translate complex AI capabilities into user-friendly, robust, and value-bringing product experiences.
* Manage product lifecycle end-to-end, from discovery and validation through delivery, launch, and iteration, monitoring KPIs to assess impact and insights.
* Develop a compelling vision and long-term roadmap for your area aligned with Voyados' goals; translate into tactical plans balancing innovation, speed, and stability.
* Leading strategic planning and roadmap discussions with other Product Managers and stakeholders.
* Collaborate closely with colleagues in Engineering, UX, Marketing, Sales, Services, and Customer Success to align initiatives and build effective partnerships across the business to make sure we’re aligned and moving forward together.
* Provide mentorship and guidance to senior and experienced product managers, contributing to the growth and development of the product area and teams as a whole.


 So, who are you?
   

  

 You are a strong communicator, business-oriented, and possess a strategic mindset that enables you to drive meaningful change. In addition to these attributes, you are likely:
   

  

* Senior Product Manager / Area Lead experience in B2B SaaS or martech.
* Experienced in defining strategy, roadmaps, and successfully delivering outcomes at scale across multiple teams.
* Experience applying AI/ML and data-driven insights into product strategy.
* A strong people leader who knows how to coach, empower, and elevate those around you.


 If you have deep knowledge of CRM and CXP solutions for retail with a hands-on understanding of how retailers think, operate, and make decisions, that would be extra meritorious.
   

  

**What's in it for you?**
 Voyado wouldn’t be the powerful platform it is without the people behind it. We really care for our Voyadoers, and some examples of what we can offer you are:
   

  

* An engaged team with a knowledge-sharing and friendly culture
* A high-impact, visible opportunity in a fast-growing SaaS company.
* Opportunity to drive change and make an impact on how we deliver value to our customers
* 5000 SEK in wellness allowance
* 30 days of paid vacation
* And many other perks, of course!


 Ready to join the team?
   

  

 Lovely! Applying is super easy. We'd love to get to know you and understand what makes you tick, so write a few lines about what would be an exciting challenge for you going forward. We are eager to get to know you and what you love to do, so be yourself and let that shine through in your application!
   

  

 Additional information
   

  

 As part of our recruitment process, we conduct a background check on the final candidate. We use background checks from Scandinavian Recruitment Intelligence. Here you can read more about how a background check is done.
   

  

 The summer vacation season is around the corner! We’ll be slower to respond during July, and the interview process will pick up again in mid-August. But don’t hesitate to apply now if you think you’re a great fit; we’d love to hear from you!
   

  

 Voyado is the customer experience platform made for retail. We help brands turn every interaction—from first click to repeat purchase—into lasting loyalty.
   

  

 With AI-powered tools for search, personalization, marketing, and loyalty, we make it easy for retailers to grow and connect with customers in smarter ways.
   

  

 Loved by 400+ brands, Voyado is on a mission to become Europe’s most beloved retail companion.

title: Math Game Designer
description:
The Math Game Designer plays a vital part of Quickspin’s product team, laying the foundation for a wide variety of games. We deliver diverse, innovative, and high-quality games, where the game logic is in the center. With your knowledge of successful slot mechanics and experience in designing mathematical models, you will be able to make a real difference in designing our games. You will be a part of a small math team but work in cross-functional collaborations, in a casual and fun atmosphere, where the pace is high and all voices matter.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 In this role, you be responsible for creating, refining, and maintaining games; creating prototypes in Java. As a senior member of the Game Studio, you will share your knowledge and be a leading individual in your field. You will brainstorm with your peers to conceive and refine new ideas, as well as provide information that producers, developers, and artists need to embody the games you design. For this role, we want you to have:
   

  

* 2+ years’ experience designing mathematical models for slot games.
* A University degree in a technical subject, such as mathematics/statistics, engineering, or computer science.
* Experience programming solutions in the area of probability and statistics in an object-oriented language, such as C++, Java, or C#.
* Experience working in multi-disciplinary teams and providing specifications for other members of the team.
* Good knowledge of the gambling industry and a passion about gaming or slot games
* Great written and spoken English skills.


**Additional Information**
**Who are you and what do we offer**
 We are seeking a driven and creative person who speaks up, never settles, and has plenty of ideas, and can create awesome math models that will help us create the best and most innovative games ever. You enjoy working in cross-functional teams and communicating with team members. We go by the vision of “We create Awesomeness” and that goes with everything we do - from creating a great work environment together to making thrilling games. Life at Quickspin simply never gets boring – and it won’t take long until it really feels like home. You will be surrounded by kind, corny, and simply put - awesome people - that are truly passionate about what they do. We are also proud to say that we offer an excellent package, flexible hours and of course, a challenging and rewarding job in one of the fastest growing and most exciting industries there is.
   

  

**Interested?**

title: Chief Commercial Officer
company_industry: Online and Mail Order Retail, Retail Apparel and Fashion, and Retail
description:
*Are you ready to lead the global growth journey of Polarn O. Pyret, a well-established Swedish childrenswear brand? As CCO, you will set the commercial strategy, accelerate international expansion, and lead a passionate team with digital at the core.* 




  





**About Polarn O. Pyret** 




 Polarn O. Pyret is a leading Swedish childrenswear brand, founded in 1976 with a vision to create high-quality, sustainable, and timeless clothing for children. Known for its signature stripes and durable designs, the brand combines functionality with Scandinavian style. Today, Polarn O. Pyret operates across multiple markets through e-commerce, retail, and wholesale, always driven by a commitment to quality, sustainability, and making clothes that can be loved and passed on from child to child.
 



  





**About the Role** 




 We are looking for a strategic and commercially driven Chief Commercial Officer (CCO) to take full ownership of the global commercial agenda. In this key role, you will lead the company’s strategy across eCommerce, marketplaces, and retail, driving profitable growth while safeguarding brand strength and long-term sustainability.
 



  





 As part of the Global Management Team, you will work closely with the CEO and Board to define strategic priorities, scale international expansion, and align commercial performance with customer value. This is a unique opportunity to step into an executive leadership role where digital growth is at the core. In this role you will:
 



  




* Lead and own the global commercial strategy across eCommerce, marketplaces, and retail.
* Drive sales, profitability, and margin delivery through a data-led approach.
* Take full accountability for digital performance, including conversion, retention, and customer lifetime value.
* Champion innovation in digital platforms, UX, A/B testing, and merchandising.
* Align retail operations with digital strategy to ensure a seamless customer experience.
* Build, mentor, and develop a high-performing commercial organisation.
* Partner with the CEO and Board on strategic planning and investment decisions.



  





**Your Background** 




 The ideal candidate has extensive experience in commercial leadership roles within D2C consumer brands. You combine strategic vision with operational execution and have a proven track record of scaling digital channels as a core revenue driver. You are comfortable leading teams, influencing at board level, and making data-driven commercial decisions in an international context. You are someone who has:
 



  




* 5+ years of commercial leadership experience with full P&L responsibility.
* A proven track record of scaling eCommerce and digital channels internationally.
* Strong leadership skills with experience managing and developing senior managers.
* The ability to balance strategic thinking with operational execution.
* Strong analytical skills and a data-driven, commercial mindset.
* Fluency in English (Swedish is a plus).



  





**What Polarn O. Pyret Offers** 




 This is a rare opportunity to join a brand with a strong foundation and clear mandate for digital growth. You will have full ownership of the global commercial agenda and the ability to shape the next chapter of an established, values-driven brand. The role combines strategic leadership with hands-on impact!
 



  





**Application Process** 




 This is a full-time executive role based in Stockholm with a hybrid working policy.
 



  





 If you have any questions about the role, feel free to contact Jennifer Holmgren at Jennifer@ecommercerecruit.se.
 



  





 Applications are reviewed continuously, so we recommend submitting yours early to be part of the selection process.

title: Front End/ Full Stack Engineering Manager (Singapore based, relocation provided)
description:
**About Agoda**
 Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with a global network of 4.7M hotels and holiday properties worldwide, plus flights, activities, and more. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 7,100+ employees representing 95+ nationalities in 27 markets foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.
   

  

 Our Purpose - Bridging the World Through Travel
   

  

 We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.
   

  

 Get to Know our Team:
   

  

 The Front-End Department builds the Agoda web and app products. We have several teams in front-end focusing on different aspects of our products including accommodations, flights, payments, marketing, post-booking services, and more. Agoda’s marketplace is the world. We build localized and optimized user experiences at scale on every major internet platform. These include our mobile websites, native apps, and desktop sites. We hire people from around the world who have a passion for using technology to create and implement the best user experiences. Our teams work on the full stack and build end-to-end systems including user interfaces, APIs, backend systems, and database systems. Our products are always evolving and under experimentation. We accomplish this by having an amazing degree of automation, CI/CD systems, and use a modularized approach. As we are data driven and measure our results, we continually innovate and improve our work. We are looking for the next great talent who strives to learn and grow and has a standard of excellence, strong sense of ownership, and great technical skills.
   

  

 The Opportunity:
   

  

 We are looking hands-on Development Managers who have unique knowledge and abilities to contribute to our highly scaled web products and mobile applications. You must be a strong leader who can guide our staff beyond our already high standards of engineering to the next level. The manager roles at Agoda are some of the most significant and challenging roles at the company. The right candidate is both extremely hands on – technically excellent, with solid engineering principles – and exhibits strong leadership and people development skills. We are looking for world class managers to lead one or more of our engineering teams.
   

  

 Project Description:
   

  

 This project is centered on building advanced customer-facing AI-powered bots that elevate user experiences across multiple platforms. These bots are designed to simplify the pre-booking journey by providing quick, accurate responses to customer inquiries. By combining cutting-edge technology with a deep understanding of user behavior, the team ensures the bots are intuitive, efficient, and aligned with business goals.
   

  

 In this Role, you'll get to:
   

  

* Maintain ownership and responsibility of mission critical systems.
* Guide one or more Agile teams to success.
* Get involved with full stack, server, and mobile app engineering and guide server, client, and infrastructure technical staff to the best solutions.
* Directly manage between 5 and 10 technology professionals and be responsible for their performance at the company.


 What you'll Need to Succeed:
   

  

* At least 3 years of experience managing engineering teams of 3 people and more, 5+ years of experience in software engineering
* Proficient with front-end (FE) web client-side technologies (React, Redux state management, JavaScript, SASS, Performance optimization)
* Knowledge in back-end (BE) development, with experience in Kotlin and/or Python preferred
* Knowledge in scale, microservices and clean architecture
* Excellent people management and communication skills
* B.S. in Computer Science or quantitative field; M.S. preferred


 It's Great if you have:
   

  

* Machine Learning, GPT, prompt engineering and other AI project experience
* Experience working with Large Language Models (LLMs) or related AI/ML technologies is a significant plus

title: Backendutvecklare (Rust)
description:
Vi söker en senior backendutvecklare med stark Rust-kompetens som trivs i samarbete med produkt, UX och andra utvecklare. Du bygger skalbara tjänster och API:er i en modern molnmiljö, med fokus på prestanda, säkerhet och robust testning.
   

  

**Vi söker dig som:**
* Har gedigen erfarenhet av backendutveckling och Rust i produktion (t.ex. async m. Tokio/Axum/Actix).
* Kan designa och implementera skalbara API:er (REST/gRPC) och eventdrivna tjänster.
* Behärskar databaser (gärna PostgreSQL) och cache/meddelandeköer (Redis/Kafka el. liknande).
* Är van vid Docker/Kubernetes, CI/CD och moln (AWS/Azure/GCP).
* Skriver testbar och säker kod samt är bekväm med kodgranskningar.
* Är social, kommunikativ och trivs i nära samarbete med intressenter.


**Meriterande** 
 : Erfarenhet av Go/TypeScript, observability (OpenTelemetry/Grafana/Prometheus), IaC (Terraform), samt performance-profilering i Rust.

title: Staff Software Engineer – Android (Bangkok based)
description:
**About Agoda**
 Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with a global network of 4.7M hotels and holiday properties worldwide, plus flights, activities, and more. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 7,100+ employees representing 95+ nationalities in 27 markets foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.
   

  

 Our Purpose - Bridging the World Through Travel
   

  

 We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.
   

  

 Get to Know our Team:
   

  

 The Full Stack Engineering Department builds the Agoda web and app products. We have several teams in front-end focusing on different aspects of our products including accommodations, flights, payments, marketing, post-booking services, and more. Agoda’s marketplace is the world. We build localized and optimized user experiences at scale on every major internet platform. These include our mobile websites, native apps, and desktop sites. We hire people from around the world who have a passion for using technology to create and implement the best user experiences. Our teams work on the full stack and build end-to-end systems including user interfaces, APIs, backend systems, and database systems. Our products are always evolving and under experimentation. We accomplish this by having an amazing degree of automation, CI/CD systems, and use a modularized approach. As we are data driven and measure our results, we continually innovate and improve our work. We are looking for the next great talent who strives to learn and grow and has a standard of excellence, strong sense of ownership, and great technical skills.
   

  

 The Opportunity:
   

  

 Our App platform team tackles Infrastructure pain points head on. The end goal is to create a robust ecosystem that the wider mobile org can reliably build within and on top of, and members of the App platform team dedicate their time and attention entirely towards this end. Examples of this include CI/CD improvements, App architecture and core-libraries improvements, dev experience improvements, Customer experience improvements.
   

  

 In this Role, you'll get to:
   

  

* Designing, developing, and maintaining Android applications, that integrate with the platform's core services and APIs
* Working closely with designers, product managers, and other developers to define requirements, design features, and deliver a cohesive user experience
* Establishing and enforcing best practices for app testing and quality assurance
* Identifying and implementing opportunities for optimization across the technology stack, focusing on cost, efficiency, velocity & dev happiness
* Enabling impactful collaboration and cross-team projects on big projects, making a dent in the quality of our services, code & architecture

* Exhibiting technical leadership throughout the broader organization, conveying complex technical trade-offs to non-techies such as business owners & C-suite executives


 What you'll Need to Succeed:
   

  

* Overall experience of 6+ years in engineering roles
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field
* Proven hands-on experience with owning production services with significant impact on design, development, deployment, monitoring & evolution
* Advanced proficiency in modern App development frameworks and architectural choices
* Advanced understanding of cross-platform technology usage in mobile App development like React Native, Web-views, flutter etc
* Deep understanding of app development challenges and solutions
* Expert-level knowledge of testing methodologies, tools, and best practices
* Proven track record of optimizing applications for better performance
* Strong understanding of security and accessibility standards
* Can perform deep research & take decisions on complex projects. Able to easily toggle between running as a lone wolf and also works great as part of a pack
* Curiosity, staying on the cutting-edge of technological improvements and open source advancement
* Strong communication skills, with the ability to explain complex technical details to stakeholders at all levels


 It's Great if you have:
   

  

* Experience in multiple platforms including iOS, Android, Web, and API services
* Have worked on an App or Internet company that is at scale with large numbers of users and transactions per second
* Have experience in a data driven company with experience analyzing and working with Big Data
* Lead teams and greenfield projects solving large system problems
* Worked on global projects serving world markets with distributed data centers and localization of the front end and data


 This position is based in Bangkok, Thailand (Relocation Provided)

title: IT Rep
description:
Vi söker för kunds räkning. För att ansöka till tjänsten, vänligen besök https://karriarguiden.se/sv/jobb/it-rep. Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
  
  

About this vacancy
  
IT Rep– Internationella Engelska Skolan Österåker
  
  

Internationella Engelska Skolan has been making a real difference for our students for 30 years. We believe that it is thanks to our clear ethos and dedicated, present leadership that our schools provide an environment where everyone works towards common goals.
  
  

At IES Österåker, we are now looking for an IT Rep. to join our team.
  
  

About the role
  
  

As an IT Rep, you’ll be the school’s everyday hero when it comes to IT. One moment you might be helping someone reset a forgotten password, the next you’ll be setting up accounts for a new colleague, managing phone subscriptions, or troubleshooting a projector in a classroom. The role is broad and varied – sometimes you’ll solve problems on-site, sometimes remotely.
  
  

You don’t need to be an expert from day one – what matters most is your curiosity, service-minded approach, and willingness to learn. The rest you’ll pick up along the way! This is a 50% position, but there is potential to combine it with other roles within the school to create a full-time position.
  
  

**Example tasks:**  

* Managing user accounts, permissions, and passwords
* Supporting the onboarding and offboarding process for staff and students
* Administering phone subscriptions and IT equipment
* Providing basic IT support (computers, networks, printers, projectors, etc.)
* Installing and preparing laptops and mobile devices
* Supporting staff and students in using digital platforms and tools
* Creating simple guides and routines to make IT easier for everyone
* Acting as contact person for external IT providers when needed


Who are you?
  
  

We believe you are someone who enjoys helping others and doesn’t stress if you don’t have the answer right away. You’re solution-oriented, approachable, and find technology fun – even if you’re not an expert (yet).
  
  

Previous experience in IT or administration is a plus but not a requirement. Experience in schools or other service-oriented environments is also a bonus. It is a big plus if you enjoy working with social media and websites.
  
  

**We Offer:**  

* A varied role where you’ll learn and grow together with us
* A workplace full of commitment, curiosity, and teamwork
* The chance to gain hands-on experience with IT and digitalization in education
* Strong support from the HQ IT department, so you’re never alone with technical challenges


**Please note:** The advertisement may be closed before the application deadline if we find the right candidate.
  
About IES
  
Internationella Engelska Skolan (IES) is a leading independent school group with academic results far above average and a diverse and energetic staff. Teaching is in both Swedish and English, and the hallways are bilingual. The language of meetings and communication amongst the staff is English.
  
  

IES is one of Sweden's largest school groups at compulsory school level with 48 schools and around 32,000 students across the country. IES has grown steadily and maintained quality since 1993.

title: senior systemtekniker inom klientmanagering
description:
* Ansök senast: 28 september 2025
* Stockholm
Hos oss på SVT får du arbeta i en verksamhet som engagerar och berör. Tillsammans med kunniga kollegor blir du en del av en kreativ miljö där vi skapar framtidens public service. SVT:s klientteam ansvarar för att utveckla, standardisera, automatisera, felsöka och förvalta vår klientmiljö. Här får du arbeta nära olika delar av organisationen och bidra till viktiga initiativ inom digitalisering.


**Vad vi erbjuder dig:**  

Hos SVT får du en varierande och händelserik vardag samtidigt som du arbetar på ett av Sveriges mest kända varumärken! Här väntar ett team med en familjär känsla som ständigt lär av varandra. Du kommer också att få vara med i spännande initiativ och projekt för att SVT ska bli framgångsrik i sin digitaliseringsresa.


**Vem vi tror att du är:**  

Vi söker dig som har eftergymnasial utbildning inom IT/teknik och har flerårig erfarenhet av klientinfrastruktur med fokus på klientutveckling. Du uttrycker dig väl på svenska och engelska, har god samarbetsförmåga och hög servicekänsla. Du är strukturerad, noggrann och tar gärna egna initiativ.


Vi söker dig med erfarenhet inom:


* SCCM och Intune
* Powershell
* Active Directory
* PC-hantering, klientinfrastruktur och Windows 10
* MSI-paketering

Meriterande är kunskap inom:


* Mac-hantering
* Programmering (.NET C# eller liknande)
* Autopilot

**Vad tjänsten innebär:**  

Arbetet är varierat och omfattar både akuta driftfrågor, systemförvaltning och projekt. Du samarbetar med beställare och tjänsteägare för att säkerställa en säker, stabil och användarvänlig klientplattform.


**Hur du ansöker:**  

I den här rekryteringsprocessen använder vi oss av urvalsfrågor och CV i stället för att be om personligt brev. Det gör vi för att säkerställa att rekryteringen blir kompetensbaserad och effektiv och att vi får samma viktiga information av alla kandidater.


**Övrigt:**  

Svenskt medborgarskap är ett krav då tjänsten kan komma att placeras i säkerhetsklass.


Placeringsort är Stockholm och tillträdesdatum snarast eller enligt överenskommelse. Urval sker löpande så skicka gärna in din ansökan så snart som möjligt, men senast den 28 september.


Har du frågor om tjänsten är du välkommen att kontakta Catarina Norlén Gruppchef för Teknisk support och PST via mejl catarina.norlen@svt.se . Fackliga frågor besvaras av Maria Nassikas Unionen, Jonas Ohlsson SJF och Fanny Lindhé SACO. Samtliga nås via växeln 08-784 00 00.


Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!


**Vi har riktigt bra förmåner**
-------------------------------

* Hälsa - Upp till 3500 kr i friskvårdsbidrag
* Semester - Du som fyllt 40 år har tre extra semesterdagar
* Pension - ITP tjänstepension
* Föräldratillägg/föräldralön
* Verktyg - Mobiltelefon för privat bruk (exkl. utlandssamtal)
* Ledighet med bibehållen lön - Permission 1-2 dagar/år vid t.ex. flytt eller begravning
**Om företaget**
----------------

**Vi jobbar för hela bilden**

Från nära till jordens alla hörn. Från förtvivlan till hopp. Från allvar till humor. Vi engagerar, berör och berikar – och gör skillnad på riktigt. Vi drivs av att veta mer och av att komma närmare. Därför går vi på djupet, iakttar, lyssnar nyfiket och låter varje berättelse växa fram. För vi har ett viktigt uppdrag: att skapa ett innehåll som engagerar alla i Sverige.


Allt finns innanför våra väggar, från idé och produktion till distribution. Vi vill vara det kreativa navet som driver branschen framåt och när vi behöver samarbetar vi med de allra bästa. Alla roller är lika viktiga och alla är specialister på sin länk i kedjan som granskar, ljussätter, filmar, iscensätter, roar, formaterar, informerar och inspirerar. Vi behöver ständigt locka till oss talanger som ger oss nya perspektiv. Vill du bli en del av berättelsen?


Vår ambition är att granska och skildra de frågor som är viktiga för dig. SVT verkar i allmänhetens tjänst och drivs självständigt i förhållande till politiska, kommersiella och andra intressen i samhället.


Vår värdegrund SVT ska spegla hela Sverige, i såväl vårt utbud som i sammansättningen av vår personal. Därför använder vi oss av inkluderande och kompetensbaserad rekrytering. Det innebär att vi strävar efter att ge alla kandidater i en rekryteringsprocess förutsättningar att bedömas enligt samma mall och kriterier, och enbart utifrån kompetens. För oss är mångfald inte bara något vi pratar om, det är vårt uppdrag.


Kreativ Med kreativitet och journalistiskt mod skapar vi berättelser och hittar lösningar utöver det förväntade.


Kunnig Med kunskap, glädje och engagemang bidrar vi till ett klokare Sverige.


Kvalitet Kvalitet är vår vattenstämpel.


Oberoende Trovärdighet är grunden för SVT. Den utgörs av opartiskhet, saklighet och ärlighet.


Inbjudande Vi är nära vår publik och vi finns till för alla.


Catarina Norlen | Kontaktperson

  


+###### 

Stockholm  



Vid tillsättningar görs en bakgrundskontroll av slutkandidat. Vid en tillsvidareanställning blir du automatiskt krigsplacerad.

title: Systemadministratör sökes till Administrativ enhet på Område 5!
description:
Tillsammans utvecklar vi Sahlgrenska Universitetssjukhuset för en hållbar framtid. Vi ställer om hälso- och sjukvården med målet att vara Europas ledande universitetssjukhus 2032. Tillsammans med patienterna arbetar vi för kvalitet, tillgänglighet, patientsäkerhet, forskning, utbildning och innovation – i ett sammanhållet hälso- och sjukvårdssystem i Västra Götalandsregionen. Vår vision och våra mål tar sikte mot en vård av yttersta kvalitet, där patienten alltid är i fokus. Vi erbjuder hälso- och sjukvård lokalt och regionalt, men också högspecialiserad vård till patienter i hela landet och utomlands. Våra medarbetare är vår styrka och de bidrar i kunskapsutbyten nationellt och internationellt. Med digitala verktyg och nya arbetssätt kan vi förenkla vardagen på sjukhuset och erbjuda en modern, tillgänglig och effektiv vård av högsta kvalitet.  

  



**Om oss**


Tjänsten kommer tillhöra Administrativ enhet 1 inom verksamhetsområde Kirurgi Östra med placering Sahlgrenskatomten, där medicinska sekreterare och administratörer arbetar och servar enheter under verksamheterna Hybrid och Intervention, Anestesi-Operation-IVA Sahlgrenska och Anestesi-Operation-IVA Östra. Totalt är vi runt 1300 anställda.


Inom Administrativa enheten pågår kontinuerligt olika projekt som syftar till utveckling och förbättring. Vi strävar efter att ge våra medarbetare stor frihet under eget ansvar och arbetar kontinuerligt med att utveckla den potential som finns hos individer och i gruppen.

**Om jobbet**


Tjänsten som systemadministratör innebär att du administrerar den lokala IT-miljön, ser till att det digitala arbetet för alla i verksamhetsområdet löper friktionsfritt, är ett administrativt stöd och en IT-support i det dagliga arbetet. Du är delaktig i förekommande övergripande IT-projekt inom förvaltningen och ingår i Sahlgrenska Universitetssjukhusets (SU) förvaltnings LITA nätverk. Uppdraget innebär att vara ansvarig för LITA-gruppen på vår enhet. Du kommer ha en kollega som arbetar på Administrativ enhet 2 med liknande uppdrag på Östratomten.


Du kommer att vara ett stöd till våra enheter kring beställning av behörigheter, inköp, beställning och utbyten av IT-relaterad utrustning och telefoni. I uppdraget är man första kontakt vid daglig ”första hjälpen” och har ansvar för handledning och utbildning vid IT-relaterade problem. Din roll är att vara en nyckelperson inom IT på vår administrativa enhet och du kommer arbeta gentemot tre verksamhetsområden; Anestesi-Operation-IVA på Sahlgrenska och Östra, samt Hybrid och Intervention på Sahlgrenska. Den huvudsakliga placeringen är på Sahlgrenskatomten.

**Om dig**

  

Du ska trivas med att arbeta på ett flexibelt sätt. Eftersom tjänsten innebär att du har kontakt med många personer dagligen förutsätter vi att du har god samarbetsförmåga, är van att ta egna initiativ och kan organisera ditt arbete självständigt. Du är noggrann och har ett gott bemötande mot patienter och personal. Du har goda språkkunskaper i svenska i tal och skrift, god IT-kunskap och är intresserad av att vara verksamhetens administrativa stöd.


För arbetet som systemadministratör krävs förutom ett stort IT-intresse också ett starkt servicefokus och ett pedagogiskt intresse! Ordningssinne, planeringsförmåga, kommunikationsskicklighet och en förmåga till nätverkande och nytänkande är egenskaper vi efterfrågar.


Det är meriterande om du har har utbildning inom hälso- och sjukvårdsadministration alternativt har motsvarande godkänd medicinsk sekreterarutbildning samt har erfarenhet av SU och förekommande system som används här (Elvis, Melior, MedSpeech, 1177 med mera) men även erfarenhet av digital support. Du ska ha god erfarenhet i Officepaketet.

**Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!**

**Möt några av våra medarbetare - Sahlgrenska Universitetssjukhuset**


Om Västra GötalandsregionenVästra Götalandsregionen finns till för människorna i Västra Götaland. Vi ser till att det finns god hälso- och sjukvård för alla. Vi arbetar för en hållbar utveckling och tillväxt, bra miljö, förbättrad folkhälsa, ett rikt kulturliv och goda kommunikationer i hela Västra Götaland.Västra Götalandsregionen arbetar aktivt för att digitalisera fler arbetssätt. För att vara en del av den digitala omvandlingen har du med dig grundläggande färdigheter och kan använda digitala verktyg och tjänster. Du kan söka information, kommunicera, interagera digitalt, är riskmedveten och har motivation att delta i utvecklingen för att lära nytt.Västra Götalandsregionen krigsplacerar alla tillsvidareanställda medarbetare. Vill du veta mer om Västra Götalandsregionen kan du besöka vår introduktion till nya medarbetare på länken www.vgregion,se/introduktion. Du kan även läsa mer i presentation om Lön, ersättning och förmåner – det här får du som medarbetare i VGR. AnsökanVästra Götalandsregionen ser helst att du registrerar din ansökan via rekryteringssystemet. Om du som sökande har frågor om den utannonserade tjänsten eller av särskilda och speciella skäl inte kan registrera dina uppgifter i ett offentligt system - kontakta kontaktperson för respektive annons. Till bemannings-, förmedlings- och rekryteringsföretag och till dig som är försäljare:Vi undanber oss vänligen men bestämt direktkontakt med bemannings-, förmedlings- och rekryteringsföretag samt andra externa aktörer och försäljare av ytterligare jobbannonser. Västra Götalandsregionen har upphandlade avtal.


Anställningsform: tillsvidareanställning | Anställningens omfattning: heltid | Antal lediga befattningar: 1 | Sysselsättningsgrad: 100% | Ort: Göteborg | Län: Västra Götalands län | Land: Sweden | Referensnummer: 2025/4238 | Kontakt: Enhetschef, Ann-Charlotte Dahlqvist 073-5342371, | Facklig företrädare: Vision, Niki Blomqvist 070-0824724, | Publicerat: 2025-09-12 | Sista ansökningsdag: 2025-09-28

title: Skoladministratör till Brinellskolan
description:
Fagersta ligger i norra Västmanland. Kommunen har en omfattande samverkan med närliggande kommuner. Det geografiska läget är mycket bra med närhet till ett stort befolkningsområde. I kommunen är vi idag cirka 13 100 invånare. Välkommen till ett meningsfullt arbete och en arbetsplats där vi samarbetar för dem vi är till för utifrån kommunens gemensamma värdegrund; samarbete, trygghet, ansvar, respekt - STAR.Hos oss har du möjlighet till bland annat friskvårdsbidrag och frikort till simhall, gym och utomhusbad.

### **Om arbetsplatsen – det här är vi!**


Brinellskolan är en gymnasieskola i Fagersta kommun. Skolan har tio nationella program samt introduktionsprogram, språkintroduktion, lärlingsutbildning och anpassad gymnasieskola. Skolan har ca 480 elever och 9/10 lärare har lärarlegitimation. Vi har ett välsorterat bibliotek och ett gott samarbete med företag, högskolor och universitet.


Vi jobbar för en skola dit elever och personal går med en känsla av trygghet och trivsel där individen har möjlighet till personlig utveckling. Brinellskolan har välutbildad och engagerad personal och vi strävar emot att hitta individuella lösningar så att alla elever skall kunna nå sin fulla potential oavsett om det gäller stöd eller extra utmaningar.

### **Ditt uppdrag**


Som skoladministratör har du en viktig roll där du samordnar och administrerar elev- och personal, systemadministration samt övrigt vanligt förekommande administrativa arbetsuppgifter.


Du kommer att ha ansvar för administrativa arbetsuppgifter som bland annat:

* Elevadministration inklusive hantering av studieplaner, betyg och betygskataloger.
* Systemadministration (t.ex. Schoolsoft, Skola24 m.fl.)
* Beställningar och fakturamottagning


Arbetet är varierande och kräver stor flexibilitet. I dina arbetsuppgifter ingår service mot bland annat skolledning, medarbetare, elever och föräldrar.

### **Dina kvalifikationer och meriter**


Vi söker dig med tidigare erfarenhet av liknande roller och som gärna har eftergymnasial utbildning inom administration, IT eller annat relevant område.  

  

Du är samarbetsvillig och gillar att vara "en i laget".  

Du har god digital kompetens.  

Du är flexibel, ansvarstagande och strukturerad i ditt arbete.  

Du är stresstålig och har förmåga att hantera flera arbetsuppgifter samtidigt.  

Du har lätt att anpassa dig till förändrade förhållanden.  

Du uttrycker dig väl på svenska i både tal och skrift


Det är meriterande med tidigare erfarenhet av administrativa system som Schoolsoft, Skola24, Digitala Nationella Prov (DNP), Personec, Unit4 och att du är väl bekant med Officepaketet.


För anställning krävs uppvisande av utdrag från Polisens belastningsregister. Detta ska uppvisas vid eventuellt intervjutillfälle.


Rekrytering kan komma att ske under ansökningsperioden. Intervjuer sker löpande.  

Provanställning om 6 månader tillämpas.


Vi eftersträvar en god åldersspridning och ser positivt på sökande ur alla åldrar. Vi strävar även efter att vara en arbetsplats som speglar samhällets mångfald. Fagersta kommun ingår i finskt förvaltningsområde och vi ser gärna sökande med kunskaper i finska i tal och skrift. Vi har gjort våra val av annonskanaler och vi undanber oss alla erbjudanden om annonserings- och rekryteringshjälp i samband med denna annons.


Anställningsform: tillsvidareanställning | Anställningens omfattning: heltid | Antal lediga befattningar: 1 | Sysselsättningsgrad: 100% | Ort: Fagersta | Län: Västmanlands län | Land: Sweden | Referensnummer: 2025/99 | Kontakt: Michael Alvbåge 0223-44969, | Facklig företrädare: Vision 0223-44258, | Publicerat: 2025-09-12 | Sista ansökningsdag: 2025-10-08

title: IT Technical Support - Tillfälligt uppdrag
description:
*Vill du att ditt jobb bidrar till något betydelsefullt och till att göra en verklig skillnad?*

 *V**årt härliga team bestående av* *supporttekniker* *har nu möjlighet att erbjuda ett* *tillfälligt uppdrag/visstidsanställning* *från och med hösten 2025 till tidig sommar 202**7.* *Detta är en möjlighet för dig som har erfarenhet och ett brinnande intresse för IT och vill ta chansen att prova på något nytt!*

 **Om rollen**  

I din roll som IT Technical Support hos AstraZeneca kommer du att vara en del av ett team som ansvarar för att säkerställa support i högsta klass till våra användare. Du kommer att arbeta i ett lokalt team med totalt sju tekniker där fokus ligger på support på plats ute hos användaren.  

  

Det här är en bred teknisk roll där du dagligen kommer att mötas av nya och varierande tekniska utmaningar - ingen dag är den andra lik. I samarbete med kollegor och andra tekniska experter är det ditt uppdrag att hjälpa våra användare att få den support de behöver och känna en trygghet på vägen till lösningen på deras tekniska problem.  

  

Då vi har både kontor, fabriker samt laboratorium så innebär det att arbetsmiljön är väldigt varierad. Dina huvudsakliga uppgifter kommer att inkludera support av hårdvara, mjukvara samt konsultering/rekommendation av IT utrustning och inköp. Utöver detta:

* Agera som primär kontakt mot slutkund som ansikte för IT
* Hantering av ärenden i ärendesystemet ServiceNow
* Driva ärenden med andra team åt slutkund
* Support av hårdvara (desktop, laptop, skrivare och mobiler)
* Arbete i miljöer så som Windows, MacOS, Office 365, Zscaler, Azure, med mera.
* Enklare felsökning av nätverk (Hands&Eyes)
* Drop-in support över disk
  

  

**Dina kvalifikationer**

* Utbildning inom relevant område eller tidigare arbetserfarenhet i liknande roll
* Ett brinnande intresse för IT och teknisk support.
* En stark vilja att göra förändring.
* Förmåga att snabbt kunna anpassa sig i en miljö som ständigt förändras
* Flytande svenska och engelska i tal och skrift
* Grundläggande kunskaper att arbeta i ärendesystem
* Mycket god datorvana
* Körkort B
  

  

**Ytterligare meriterande erfarenheter**

* Goda kunskaper i Intune
* Goda kunskaper i ServiceNow
* Erfarenhet av support mot Mac
* Tidigare erfarenhet i liknande teknisk supportroll
* Goda kunskaper i Windows och Office365 miljön
* Goda kunskaper inom MDM miljöer
